Title: The Impact of Dispersion Slope on Fiber Nonlinearity in Ultra-Wideband Optical Communication System
Abstract: © 2018 IEEE.We investigate the impact of dispersion slope induced phase-matching on nonlinear noise for wide-bandwidth signals. To ignore the third-order dispersion, its product with 6-times the bandwidth should be less than the second-order dispersion, as for wavelengths from 1360-1570nm in SSMF.
